original_title: WCW Clash of The Champions V: St. Valentine's Massacre
overview: Clash of the Champions V took place on February 15, 1989 at the Cleveland Convention Center in Cleveland, Ohio. There were 5,000 people in attendance and the show drew a 4.6 rating on TBS. This show was warm up show for the Chi-Town Rumble PPV only 5 days later.
title: WCW Clash of The Champions V: St. Valentine's Massacre
